settings.subtitle: Democratizing Fragrance
settings.title: CONCEPT
settings.text:
We are reinventing the fragrance industry to benefit consumers and allow you to experience some of the most luxurious scents in the world regardless of your budget.Â 

We develop Premier Alternatives to overpriced luxury fragrance by eliminating the 'Brand Tax' on the fragrances you love.Â 

Our carefully developed fragrances are based on some of the worldâs most iconic scents, all while also being made with a focus on sustainability and transparency.

All ALT. Fragrances are vegan, cruelty free, and made using 100% clean ingredients.

With prices slashed to affordable levels, itâs your chance to select your favorite fragrance, without restriction.

settings.testimonial: By far the best 'dupe' Company I've tried out there. Scents last long, garner compliments, and smell the same as their counterparts for a fraction of the price!
settings.author: Talia

settings.testimonial:
Fancy on a budget

I have been buying from Alt for over a year, and have saved 5 million dollars on my Baccarat Rouge 540 Maison Francis Kurkdjian (say that 10 times as fast as you can) INSPIRED fragrance. I smell delicious at a fraction of the price. Thanks Alt! Yâall made my Christmas card list this year.
settings.author: Gina

settings.testimonial:
I love this and so does everyone else

I wasn't sure what to expect when I order this cologne but when I got it and opened it up i was pleasantly surprised by the smell and how long it lasts. I would definitely recommend this to everyone. I will be ordering more!
settings.author: Juan

settings.testimonial:
Executive Is Exactly What I Wanted!!

Very similar to my favorite brand name fragrances. The scent lasts all day without reapplying which is very important to me. Honestly, ALT is my new place to buy cologne. Very high quality!!
settings.author: Terrence
